General.Name: DGB Group NV
General.Description: DGB Group N.V. invests in, develops, and manages biodiversity and carbon offset, and nature-based projects for businesses and governments in the Netherlands and internationally. The company offers nature-based solutions comprising the management and use of nature for tackling social and environmental challenges; carbon offsetting projects for reducing carbon footprint of companies; and biodiversity protection and ecosystem services. It also provides ESG reporting and tree integration services. The company was formerly known as Verenigde Nederlandse Compagnie N.V. and changed its name to DGB Group N.V. in January 2018. DGB Group N.V. was founded in 1957 and is based in Haarlemmermeer, the Netherlands.

2.Name: Mr. Rob  Schouten
